alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; Inland Bay; North Walton; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 1:44PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WALTON...SOUTHWESTERN HOLMES AND SOUTHWESTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 115 PM CDT... At 1243 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Eglin Air Force Base, or 10 miles south of De Funiak Springs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Liberty, Live Oak, Freeport, Ponce De Leon, Ebro, Oakwood Hills, Portland, Alpine Heights, Villa Tasso, De Funiak Spring Airport, Rock Hill, Millers Ferry, Pleasant Ridge, Center Ridge, Knox Hill, Piney Grove, Argyle, and Mossy Head. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; Inland Bay; North Walton; South Walton; Washington
